titles.title: I will not let you go

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not let You go until You bless me,
I will not let You go until You bless me,
Bless me, O Lord,
Bless me, O Lord,
I will not let You go until You bless me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rend the veil of the flesh in me,
Rend the veil of the flesh in me,
Face to face I will see Thee,
Rend the veil of the flesh in me.
